title: New jinx skin please
body: so i main jinx and I'm not a huge fan of the skins she has at the moment not because they aren't good but they don't do it for me. some of the consept skins she has out like the Retro Space Jinx <3 or the witch jinx or a few others look just strait epic. https://www.google.com/search?q=jinx+skins&client=safari&rls=en&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0CAcQ_AUoAWoVChMI9OjJhpL4xwIVAVoeCh2prAnq&biw=1238&bih=811

replies.body:
You know what, since we have a 'Police Vi' and 'Police Caitlyn', why not 'Police Jinx'.
I know that the lawe of Jinx doesn't fit, but how many people read it? Unless you were here before season 3 / 4.
This would make it awesome :D
Or put in Bank Robber Jinx / Villain Jinx, that fits the lawe
Rebel Jinx, she can wear a messy/stolen police uniform

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9Qoogz3Y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-15T06:03:35.918+0000)

I agree with the Villain thing. Or maybe a Harley Quinn Jinx, that would be sick
Why did you think you were getting a free skin? Why would you enter in your details ? Why we're you searching for free skins? Why not simply buy them?
